title: I can't connect my pixel 3 to any device by cast even though they both are connected with samedevice
content: I have tried to connect my pixel 3 to fire TV stick after turning on the screen mirroring option in my stick after that it I click on the cast button above the notification panel. It was loading for 10 minutes and when I went to connection preferences and cast option then it was showing no nearby devices were found I tried the same with my smart TV the same is happening but screen is mirrored through my another phone Oppo A5 s in my fire TV stick and smart TV both so how can I mirror my phone to my fire TV stick
